metadata.name: PIM Approvals And Deny Elevation
metadata.comment: Detects when a PIM elevation is approved or denied. Outside of normal operations should be investigated.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('request approved/denied'))

output.summary: Detects when a PIM elevation is approved or denied. Outside of normal operations should be investigated.

metadata.objective: False positive: Actual admin using PIM. Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-privileged-identity-management#azure-ad-roles-assignment
